prompt: how is it not the pupil of the eye
completion: ,"There are a few reasons why the brain is considered the seat of consciousness and not the pupil of the eye. First, the brain is responsible for all of the body's functions, including vision. The pupil of the eye is only responsible for adjusting the amount of light that enters the eye. Second, the brain is where information from the senses is processed and interpreted. This includes visual information. Finally, the brain is the center of all voluntary movement. This means that it is responsible for initiating and controlling all of the body's movements, including eye movements."
